titleStmt.title: King Henry the Eighth or All is True.

note.lem: Met in the vale of Andres / 'Twixt Guines and Ardes
note.level: I use Andres ... Guines ... Ardres based on consultation with Google map. Ardes does not make sense, as it is near Lyon - some 750 km south of Calais.

note.lem: As cherubim, all gilt. The madams too,
note.level: I use "cherubim" as the plural form of cherub, relying on the plural form identified in the OED.

note.lem: Which action's self was tongue to. / All was royal; To the disposing of it nought rebelled, / Order gave each thing view; the office did / Distinctly his full function. / I mean, who set the body and the limbs / Of this great sport together, / as you guess? / One, certes, that promises no element
note.level: I have followed Foakes and McMullan in breaking this speech between Buckingham and Norfolk with the difference of keeping "as you guess" with Norfolk rather than Buckingham.

note.lem: Of the duke's confessor, John de la Car
note.level: NOTE TO SELF: This could also be Dellacourt - check ODNB.
NOTE TO SELF: This could also be Perk - check ODNB.
ODNB identifies the monk as Nicolas Hopkins rather than Michael
I have added Secretary entering with rest, since Cardinal speaks to someone at tln ####
